attributes.action: Investigate were the pork meat comes from for Richmond sausages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IF Richmond is an Irish based company,my reason for this petition is,if it is Irish were does the meat come from,for there products.Owing to the scare of cancer causing callagens in the Irish Pork.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Food Standards Agency.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
